messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] hello all
messages.msgSnippet: Buy CD-ROM of Eri Takase, www.shodokai.com, this might help you. Arigatou, Totok Sudarijanto http://www.samurai.or.id e-mail: totoks@samurai.or.id Iaijutsu is
messages.messageBody:
Buy CD-ROM of Eri Takase, www.shodokai.com, this might help you.

Arigatou,

Totok Sudarijanto
http://www.samurai.or.id
e-mail: totoks@...

"Iaijutsu is training for life-or-death confrontation. To quit means death. Once you have decided to be an iaijutsu practitioner, you cannot quit!"


-----Original Message-----
>From: "Florin Arhire"<farhire@...>
>Sent: 12/7/06 3:30:24 PM

>Subject: [samuraihistory] hello all

>to write shodo...caligraphic japaneese, because I'm a great fan of
>Nippon ideograms.

>thanks in advance,

messages.subject: Re: hello all
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Florin Arhire" <farhire@...> wrote:
>
> as a new member of this group, I'd like to ask questions about learning
> to write shodo...caligraphic japaneese, because I'm a great fan of
> Nippon ideograms.
>
> any sugestions?
>
> thanks in advance,
>
> flo
>
Suggestions for questions?

messages.subject: hello all
messages.msgSnippet: as a new member of this group, I d like to ask questions about learning to write shodo...caligraphic japaneese, because I m a great fan of Nippon ideograms.
messages.messageBody:
as a new member of this group, I'd like to ask questions about learning
to write shodo...caligraphic japaneese, because I'm a great fan of
Nippon ideograms.

any sugestions?

thanks in advance,

flo

or what?

messages.messageBody:
hello all..it must be a little wierd for someone from india to join in.
but my interest in samurai..their way of living..has allured me into
this.ive been having this fascination on how they use swords an thier
various fighting methods. hope someone helps me out here..bcause i have
no clue in anythin.
with warm regards,
saurabh
